## Public Member Functions

### getScalarOpcForReduction() {#a7248cdbc5ca8ce9465bcc2372a4dc90f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::GVecReduce::getScalarOpcForReduction ()"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get the opcode for the equivalent scalar operation for this reduction.

E.g. for G&#95;VECREDUCE&#95;FADD, this returns G&#95;FADD.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h/#l00595">595</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.
